define: Get Seller Center Current Inventory Page Data

error_list.name: error_param
error_list.description: The information you queried is not found.

params:
{"request_params":[{"description":"

Specifies the page number of data to return in the current call. Starting from 1. if data is more than one page, the page_no can be some entry to start next call. If empty, the default value is 1.

","name":"page_no","sample":"1","type":"int32","required":"False","key":"hmdaKSi"},{"description":"

Each result set is returned as a page of entries. Use the "page_size" filters to control the maximum number of entries to retrieve per page (i.e., per call), and the "page_no" to start next call. This integer value is used to specify the maximum number of entries to return in a single "page" of data.

If empty, the default value is 10. The value should be between 1 and 100.

","name":"page_size","sample":"10","type":"int32","required":"False","key":"afPbjwm"},{"description":"

0-All data；1-Product Name；2-SKU ID；3-Variations；4-Item ID

","name":"search_type","sample":"2","type":"int32","required":"False","key":"bpEzeib"},{"description":"

Bind Value and Search_type

","name":"keyword","sample":"","type":"string","required":"False","key":"EaJJDxH"},{"description":"

Whs ID list, comma-separated

","name":"whs_ids","sample":"IDL,IDG","type":"string","required":"False","key":"TDRsihD"},{"description":"

Blank-All；0-No；1-Yes

","name":"not_moving_tag","sample":"0","type":"int32","required":"False","key":"EETYfTN"},{"description":"

Blank-All；0-No；1-Yes

","name":"inbound_pending_approval","sample":"0","type":"int64","required":"False","key":"yMCQfjw"},{"description":"

Blank-All；0-No；1-Yes

","name":"products_with_inventory","sample":"0","type":"int32","required":"False","key":"XJwptcH"},{"description":"

Category id. Here you need to call the get_category API to retrieve the first-tier category_id.

","name":"category_id","sample":"100002","type":"int64","required":"False","key":"phPdCGW"},{"description":"

1-Low Stock & No Sellable stock; 2-Low Stock & To replenish; 3-Low Stock & Replenished; 4-Excess

","name":"stock_levels","sample":"1,2","type":"string","required":"False","key":"xJQGcd"},{"description":"

The warehouse region you want to query, can only query one region in a request
Optional value: BR、CN、ID、MY、MX、TH、TW、PH、VN、SG

If do not pass, will get error "block by gateway due to invalid cid"

","name":"whs_region","sample":"CN","type":"string","required":"True","key":"TMSbnZR"}],"response_params":[{"name":"request_id","type":"string","sample":"123456abc","description":"

The identifier for an API request for error tracking.

","key":"sDzEDdZ"},{"description":"

Indicate error type if hit error. Empty if no error happened.

","name":"error","sample":"","type":"string","required":null,"key":"JxRhyK"},{"description":"

Indicate error details if hit error. Empty if no error happened.

","name":"message","sample":"","type":"string","required":null,"key":"NnhZDYK"},{"description":"

Detail informations you are querying.

","name":"response","sample":"","type":"object","required":null,"key":"jczMfYB","children":[{"description":"

model name

-1-No need to calculate stock level；0-None；1-Low Stock & No Sellable stock; 2-Low Stock & To replenish; 3-Low Stock & Replenished; 4-Excess

","name":"stock_level","sample":"-1","type":"int32","required":null,"key":"DfkEPYQ"},{"description":"

","name":"in_transit_pending_putaway_qty","sample":"0","type":"int64","required":null,"key":"NQdRMPG"},{"description":"

Stocks that are available for sale. This includes warehouse sellable stock, move transfer & rack transfer reserved stock that available for sale, pre-order stock.This quantity may be greater than qty displayed to buyers as it includes stock reserved for upcoming promotions.

","name":"sellable_qty","sample":"47","type":"int64","required":null,"key":"AaWaikF"},{"description":"

Stocks reserved by buyer order, RTS. And also includes rack transfer reserved stock that are not available for sale

","name":"reserved_qty","sample":"3","type":"int64","required":null,"key":"ryARDyJ"},{"description":"

Stocks in the warehouse that are not available for sale. This includes damaged stocks, isolated stock due to expired/near expiring, in warehouse staging location, missing, etc.

","name":"unsellable_qty","sample":"0","type":"int64","required":null,"key":"aXBHryd"},{"description":"

Number of units that are above 6 days of sales coverage Days.

","name":"excess_stock","sample":"0","type":"int64","required":null,"key":"NBaFhmF"},{"description":"

Days that the current sellable and pending inbound inventory are expected to last based on current selling speed.

","name":"coverage_days","sample":"0.1","type":"float","required":null,"key":"zXJEwjj"},{"description":"
